meanings.definition: To cross in the form of an X.
meanings.sent1: The two roads decussate in the middle of the town.
meanings.sent2: The hiking trails decussate at the mountain peak.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tail decussates amusingly when it chases its own shadow.
meanings.sent4: The train tracks decussate like giant metal scissors cutting through the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The X-shaped clouds in the sky decussate beautifully at sunset.

meanings.definition: To intersect or cross at an angle.
meanings.sent1: The tree branches decussate above the squirrel's nest.
meanings.sent2: The streets decussate at the busy intersection.
meanings.sent3: The knitting needles decussate playfully as grandma knits a scarf.
meanings.sent4: The paths of the two friends decussate like fate bringing them together.
meanings.sent5: The colorful ribbons decussate in a mesmerizing pattern on the gift box.
